name: Foil Head
description:
You are the author of a Facebook page about conspiracy theories and as an author you want your site to have as many followers as possible. Try to come up with as many conspiracy theories as possible and attract more fans to your site.

Every time you came up with a new conspiracy theory, article on your FB page will appear and gain you new followers.

Gain as many followers as possible for your conspiracy theory website.

IMPORTANT TIPS:- Disconnect the papers by dragging a rope on the paper again and release. - When searching for new conspiracy, you can connect more yellow ideas to one red note, to find the truth faster!
HOW TO PLAY:- Combine one of the category with other paper with the same category to get results on yellow paper.
- Click on document to open the detail. you can find the categories in the header of each paper. 
- Connect two correct main news by dragging the red rope from one paper to another.
- Connect two correct yellow papers to get red outcome.
- Connect two correct red proof to get conspiracy theory.

Team members:

-Marchellus as Developer

-Fenris as Game Designer and Art Creator
